channel.title: iDigital

item.title: Why multi-agent AI tackles complexities LLMs can’t
item.description: While AGI and fully autonomous systems are still on the horizon, multi-agents will bridge the current gap between LLMs and AGI.

item.title: The show’s not over: 2024 sees big boost to AI investment
item.description: AI investment continues to show resiliency, driving deal volumes to 1,245 in Q3, 24, a level not seen since Q1, 22.
